tool_description: Builds comprehensive audience profiles by combining cluster data with behavioral insights and demographic attributes for marketing targeting.

cluster_assignments.description: User-to-cluster assignment data from clustering tool

demographic_profiles.description: Demographic profile data for each cluster

behavior_patterns.description: Behavioral pattern data from visit analysis

profile_detail_level.description: Detail level for profiles: summary, standard, or comprehensive

error_messages: Missing cluster assignments: Provide valid cluster assignment data with user IDs and cluster mappings.
Demographic data mismatch: Ensure demographic_profiles correspond to clusters in assignments.
Insufficient behavior data: Provide behavioral patterns that match the clustering analysis.
Invalid detail level: Use one of [summary, standard, comprehensive].
usage: Provide cluster_assignments, demographic_profiles, and behavior_patterns arrays; optionally set profile_detail_level. Returns detailed audience profiles ready for campaign targeting.

audience_profiles.description: Array of comprehensive audience profile descriptions

profile_count.description: Number of audience profiles successfully created

total_audience_size.description: Total number of users across all profiles

profile_completeness_scores.description: Array of completeness scores for each profile (0-1)
